Text:
I've decided to give Linux a try a while ago. I got to spread the word about it. So far I've tried Ubuntu, Kubuntu, Xubuntu and Linux Mint 7 gloria universal edition. I love it, it's little more complicated than windows, but once you get right it's almost flawless. Visual effects are much better than Windows 7 even! You can easily dual boot by giving some space on your harddrive away. 

try it   http://www.linuxmint.com/    Tell me what you think

http://www.linuxmint.com/download.php

They are all very good but, Linux Mint 7 just seemed like a breeze to get going.
thanks for uploading, jmb2012. Works like a dream!
